title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.36 - Hand rope cable lock
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.36 - Hand rope cable lock

State Regulations

An approved locking device shall be provided for all
hand rope controlled freight elevators that will hold the hand rope in the stop
position while the car is standing at a landing. Exception: When the hoistway doors or gates are provided with
interlocks or electric contacts, and hand rope is wholly within the
hoistway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
